title: Error installing OpenMPI+CUDA with external CUDA
body:
I added a `packages.yaml` to take an external cuda installation via
```yaml
packages:
  cuda:
    paths:
      cuda@8.0.61%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu16-x86_64: /usr/local/cuda
    buildable: False
```

When trying to install a cuda-aware MPI via `openmpi+cuda` it fails (on dev as of 4553b14) since it is kind of weirdly adding the `--with-cuda-libdir` as

`'--with-cuda=/usr/local/cuda' '--with-cuda-libdir=['"'"'/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs'"'"']'`

```
==> Building openmpi [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/home/src/spack/var/spack/stage/openmpi-2.1.1-w22h44f3bzru6544vvhkioccwqiwbmze/openmpi-2.1.1/configure' '--prefix=/home/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/openmpi-2.1.1-w22h44f3bzru6544vvhkioccwqiwbmze' '--enable-shared' '--enable-static' '--enable-mpi-cxx' '--without-psm' '--without-psm2' '--without-pmi' '--without-verbs' '--without-mxm' '--without-alps' '--without-lsf' '--without-tm' '--without-slurm' '--without-sge' '--without-loadleveler' '--with-hwloc=/home/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/hwloc-1.11.7-nsd5ek5ld357qgjjhkn3ep2w3zzq2pmu' '--disable-java' '--disable-mpi-java' '--disable-mpi-thread-multiple' '--with-cuda=/usr/local/cuda' '--with-cuda-libdir=['"'"'/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs'"'"']'
```

Here is a docker file to reproduce the issue via `docker build .` (add the `packages.yaml` in the same dir):
```
FROM       nvidia/cuda:8.0-devel

# general environment for docker
ENV        HOME /home
ENV        DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive

# spack environment
ENV        PATH "$HOME/src/spack/bin:$PATH"
COPY       packages.yaml $HOME/.spack/packages.yaml

# install minimal spack dependencies
#   also adds gfortran for spack's openmpi package
RUN        apt-get update \
           && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
              autoconf \
              ca-certificates \
              curl \
              gfortran \
              git \
              build-essential \
              python \
           && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# install spack
RUN        git clone --depth 50 https://github.com/llnl/spack.git \
           $HOME/src/spack/

# install PIConGPU dependencies
RUN        spack install cmake \
           && spack install cuda \
           && spack install openmpi+cuda
```
